name: Analytics SEO
tag_list: seo-campaign, seo, seo-analytics, website-analytics, web-site-analytics, search-engine-optimization, search-engine-optimization-campaign-
overview:
Saas Based SEO Software

Featuring Google Analytics integration, a multi-site agency dashboard and a solution for piggybacking off your competitors’ link-building activity; Analytics SEO is a unique project management tool that you can use to manage all your SEO campaigns.

Use one tool to manage a simple 5 stage process:

Site Audit: Daily site performance; robots.txt, HTML and XML sitemaps,404 pages

Keyword Research & Competition: Competitive Benchmarking and League Tables, Competitors and high potential keywords, Keyword ranking for generic and branded keywords

On-Site Optimization: Competitive Indexed Pages and Inbound Links, Find strongest, most popular and unindexed pages, Check SEO Friendly URLs

Off-Site Optimization: Automatically suggest thousands of relevant link partners, Search engine, directory and blog submission, Link Management Tools

Measure + Report: Immediate download of reports to PDF and PowerPoint, Track sale conversions, enquiries, KPIs and much more
